name: Purr Pals
description:
Back of Case - Nintendo DS (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

Here Kitty, Kitty...

Choose an adorable virtual kitten to adopt, raise, train and care for. A huge choice of unique personalities and behaviors provides hours of furry fun. Make the kitty you've always dreamed of.
    ? Choose your kitty's breed, fur, eye color and more.
    ? Train your kitten with commands, toys - even your voice.
    ? Use the touch screen to move, feed and play with your new pet.
    ? Customize the environment with hundreds of fun items.
    ? Accessorize with hats, collars, outfits, ID tags and more.
    ? Compete with your kitten in hilarious mini-games.

The possibilities with your new PurrPal are nearly endless!
